raw_text: BETSY – BASTIANS (nee NESAMONY) – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. Loving wife of Kingston,​ daughter of late William & Grace Nesamony,​ loving mother of Dinesh & Dilani,​ mother-in-law of Ruvinie & Trevor,​ grandmother of late Adria,​ Dillon,​ Andrea,​ Ryan & Trevin,​ sister of Ranjitham,​ Paul and Peter. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 5.00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 29th November followed by Christian Service and Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella on Thursday,​ 30th November at 4.00 p.m.078247

BOLLING – BERNADETTE (BERNIE) PRISICILLA (nee FERNANDO). At Rest with Jesus. Beloved wife of late Reggie Bolling,​ step mother of Derrick,​ daughter of the late Michael and late Beatrice Fernando,​ loving sister of late Carryl,​ late Aleric,​ Trisette,​ late Michael,​ Wivina,​ Charmaine,​ Bellamin,​ Firmin and Petronella,​ fond aunt to many nieces and nephews. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 11.00 a.m. on Thursday,​ 30th November for Cremation at General Cemetery Borella at 11.30 a.m. (New Crematorium).078208

COGGINS,​ ELMO C.B. – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. (09th February 1935 – 29th November 2023). Dearly beloved husband of late Monica Alice Coggins (nee Samarasinghe),​ loving father of Perry and Dino,​ father-in-law of Stephannie,​ grandfather of Nikita,​ Joanna & Ella. Remains lie at residence No. 42,​ Quarry Road (Galwala Para),​ Mirihana,​ Nugegoda. Cortege leaves residence at 12.15 p.m. on Friday,​ 1st of December 2023 for Service at St. Thomas’ Church Kotte and therafter for Cremation (3.00 p.m.) at the General Cemetery (Kanatte) Borella.078243
